hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bomb Bag#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Dodongo's Cavern Compass#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Piece of the Triforce# and #Zelda's Lullaby#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals #2 Deku Scrubs#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Dodongo's Cavern Compass#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##the Bottom of the Well## has #3# major items.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Piece of the Triforce# and #a Piece of the Triforce#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Compass Chest

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #a Piece of the Triforce# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path of #gold#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 3 Bottom

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Serenade of Water#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Serenade of Water#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #a Piece of the Triforce#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Hover Boots# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path of #gold#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #chests past Dark Link# in the Water Temple hold...^ #a Zora Tunic# and #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that unfreezing #King Zora# grants #Bombs (20 pieces)#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that plundering #the Graveyard# is a foolish choice.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bomb Bag#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Lens of Truth#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the castle guards' routes have major security vulnerabilities.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Piece of the Triforce#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Crater## has #2# major items.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Wallet#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #the Deku Tree#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Lens of Truth#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #a Strength Upgrade# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

ZF (Jabu).text: Have you ever tried hammering the ground or wall in a room with Torch Slugs, Flare Dancers, Tektites, Walltulas, Scrubs or Deku Babas?

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #treasure chest game# grants #a Bomb Bag#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.
